title: Reports claiming that PM will resign are false
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Reports claiming that Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa will resign are untrue and false, Media Secretary to the PM confirms to News 1st.
(PICTURES) Massive protest in Wijerama; Students & local defy curfew order
Country cannot be rebuilt as long as one family stays in power: Dr. Wijedasa Rajapaksha
